ItemDesc: A beast-form heliobus that homogenized after the Flaming Catastrophe War. Used to level up Traces significantly for <color=#f29e38ff>Nihility</color> characters.
ItemBGDesc: An intelligent and powerful heliobus that has started to take the form of a beast. The size of a heliobus's flame when it materializes indicates its strength. A large heliobus, having homogenized its numerous lesser peers, will gradually have a stable shape. These immortal beings can become so dangerous that they are considered calamities. "Floods, fires, landslides, and thunderstorms..."
